Amplats Medical Services Application 2024, How to register online for Amplats Medical Services 2024,  Amplats Medical Services courses, Fees, Prospectus

 

An online admission application and registration form/dates for the 2024 academic year has been released by the management of the Amplats Medical Services.

Amplats Medical Services online application ongoing;

  • First-time applicants to Amplats Medical Services
  • New qualifications and/or specializations for students
  • Candidates who applied for admission but were not offered a space or who were offered a space and took it but did not register
  • A student who completes a higher certificate or any other programme and wishes to continue with further undergraduate studies

How to Register Online for Amplats Medical Services Application 2024

For Amplats Medical Services Online Registration, you will need the following items:

  • A valid email account
  • The South Africa identification number
  • Students from abroad need a passport

Please CLICK HERE to register for Amplats Medical Services 2024
